name: Pain & Fever
description: Medications for relieving pain and reducing fever, such as ibuprofen, acetaminophen, and aspirin.

name: Cold & Flu
description: Products for treating cold and flu symptoms, including decongestants, cough suppressants, and sore throat lozenges.

name: Allergy & Sinus
description: Medications for allergies and sinus problems, such as antihistamines, nasal sprays, and decongestants.

name: Digestive Health
description: Products for treating digestive issues, including antacids, laxatives, anti-diarrheals, and probiotics.

name: First Aid
description: Supplies for treating minor injuries, such as bandages, antiseptic wipes, gauze, and pain relief creams.

name: Vitamins & Supplements
description: Vitamins, minerals, and other dietary supplements.

name: Personal Care
description: Items for personal hygiene and grooming, such as shampoo, soap, toothpaste, and skincare products.

name: Baby Care
description: Products for babies and infants, including diapers, formula, baby food, and baby wipes.

name: Eye & Ear Care
description: Products for eye and ear health, such as eye drops, ear drops, and contact lens solutions.

name: Feminine Care
description: Products related to feminine hygiene and health.

name: Sexual Health
description: Products related to sexual health and wellness.

name: Home Health Care
description: Medical supplies and equipment for home use, such as blood pressure monitors, thermometers, and mobility aids.

name: Others
description: Any other items not falling into the above categories.
